meanings.definition: A sloping mass of rock fragments at the base of a cliff.
meanings.sent1: The hikers carefully navigated the taluses at the foot of the mountain.
meanings.sent2: The taluses provided a natural barrier at the bottom of the steep cliff.
meanings.sent3: The playful goats used the taluses as their rocky playground.
meanings.sent4: The taluses resembled a giant staircase leading up to the towering cliff.
meanings.sent5: The taluses echoed with the sound of falling rocks, creating a unique atmosphere.
